# Task Authorization (TA) for Subject Matter Expert

## Title and Summary
The job of a [Subject Matter Expert] is to review international methods for calculating a Return on Investment (ROI) for non-structural disaster risk reduction and mitigation activities. The literature review undertaken by the contractor will identify and assess various approaches used internationally to calculate ROIs for non-structural activities such as land planning, capacity-building, education and more.

## Tender Information
The contract-to-be-awarded is for the services of a Subject Matter Expert, with the job reference number CB-409-92989880. This is the ninth amendment made to the original solicitation (202401466).

## Key Details
* Project start: 2024-01-22
* Project end: 2025-03-31
* Region: National Capital Region (NCR), and across Canada
* Languages: Official language (English) for document exchange and scientific gatherings; common language for daily work (French)
* Currency: Canadian Dollar (CAD)

## Objectives
The main objectives of the subject matter expert job are:

1. Review methodologies and resources provided by public bodies
2. Conduct a review of international practices and scientific literature on ROI
3. Develop and provide a comparative analysis of different methods, including an evaluation of their strengths and weaknesses
4. Recommend best practices and methods to improve ROI in non-structural disaster risk management activities
5. Document and summarize the findings into sections that will form an integral part of a complete report.

## Procedure and Evaluation Instructions
Proposals will be evaluated based on a set of criteria, focusing on the Subject Matter Expert's intrinsic capacity to master the topics to be explored (competence). Relevant information and useful reports will also be sent to potential candidates through shared mail.

## Important Contacts
The client is Public Safety Canada, located in Ottawa, ON. Phone number: (343) 549-5220 and email: chantale.gregoire@ps-sp.gc.ca. The interested contractors will have to:
* Register for the workshop (training on performances for tax credit purposes and methods for calculating ROI) administered by the client
